requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7
  • Processor:2.5GHz
  • Memory:1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:DirectX 9 compatible video card (min. GeForce 6/Radeon X1300) with 256 MB VRAM

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 670 2GB/AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for multiplayer
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
